address.address: Real Square Plot No.19, Office Commercial, Sector 3, Vasundhara, Ghaziabad

extraOptions.highlights: Principe Restaurant (Formerly Prince Restaurant) is a Multi- Cuisine Restaurant located in Vasundhara (Ghaziabad). Principe Restaurant is a perfect family Restaurant for Lunch and Dinner. We Host Birthday Parties, Anniversary party, Roka ceremony, Kitty Parties and Corporate parties at very affordable cost. We offer a great food with great taste that will make you fall in love with our food and services.

packages.content:
*Menu changes on a daily basis. All items listed are subject to availability and changes.

Service time: 3 Hours

Menu Inclusions :

Mocktails(Choose any 3)

  • Kiwi Blast
  • Strawberry Frost
  • Lemon Cooler
  • Mango Sunset

Veg Starters(Choose any 3)

  • Cajun Spiced Baby Potato
  • Potato Croquettes
  • Veg Cutlet
  • Mix Veg Pakoda
  • Samosa
  • Jalapeno Cheese Balls

Non-Veg Starters(Choose any 2)

  • Hariyali Chicken
  • Pepper Chicken
  • Tandoori Murgh
  • Peri Peri Chicken Tikka
  • Kalmi Chicken Tikka
  • Cajun Spiced BBQ Chicken

Soup(Choose any 2)

  • Tomato Soup
  • Monchow Soup
  • Chicken Soup
  • Sweet Corn Soup

Veg Main Course(Choose any 2)

  • Paneer Butter Masala
  • Paneer Makhanwala
  • Paneer do Pyaza
  • Paneer Pasanda
  • Patiala Shahi Paneer
  • Paneer Lababdar
  • Paneer Khurchan
  • Yellow Dal Tadka
  • Dal Amritsari
  • Dal Palak

Non-Veg Main Course(Choose any 2)

  • Murgh Makhani
  • Dhaniya Mirchi da Kukkud
  • Chicken Banjara
  • Murgh Korma
  • Murgh Wajid Ali
  • Chicken Chatpata
  • Dhaba Murgh
  • Murgh do Pyaza
  • Murgh Roganjosh
  • Chicken Chettinad

Dessert(Choose any 3)

  •  Gulab Jamun
  • Sheer Khurma
  • Pastry- Pineapple/ Strawberry
  • Rice Kheer
  • Phirni- Kesar
  • Banana Slice Cake
packages.title: Mocktail Package
packages.menuDetail:
Details:

This booking is valid for the date and time selected and no changes shall be entertained in this regard.

Free Cancellation

One click cancellation available 3 days  prior to the date of booking.

How to cancel

  1. Open Voucher in “My Purchases” section of mobile-website or App
  2. Click “ Cancel” on the voucher detail
  3. Click “Confirm”

Timings

Sunday      09:00 PM – 10:00 PM

Monday    09:00 PM – 10:00 PM

Tuesday    09:00 PM – 10:00 PM

Wednesday 09:00 PM – 10:00 PM

Thursday  09:00 PM – 10:00 PM

Friday    09:00 PM – 10:00 PM

Saturday  09:00 PM – 10:00 PM

Valid For:  Dine-in

Not Valid for: Takeaway, Home Delivery

How to use offer

  • Call the outlet at least one day before the booking date.
  • On the date of booking carry your confirmation email on phone or access it under the ‘my dashboard’ section of the app
  • Outlet verifies the email and allows you and your guests

Things to remember

  • IMP : ENTRY WILL BE ALLOWED ONLY FOR THE No. OF PAX BOOKED. NO ADDITIONAL PAX SHALL BE ALLOWED.
  • ADDITIONAL PAX SHALL BE ALLOWED AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF THE OUTLET AND DEPENDING UPON THE AVAILABILITY OF SPACE. MANAGEMENT DECISION SHALL BE FINAL AND BINDING IN THIS REGARD.
  • NO REFUND SHALL BE PROVIDED FOR THE NO SHOW OR REDUCED PAX.
  • Prior reconfirmation with the outlet is mandatory
  • This booking cannot be clubbed with any other offer
  • All local / national laws with respect to legal drinking age apply.
  • Not valid on Days of Special Events, please refer to Black out Dates for this offer.
  • Management decision in all respects shall be final and binding

nodes.title: Pets are not allowed on the premises.
Smoking is prohibited within the premises, in compliance with local laws.
Guests are required to respect the property and cover any damages caused by them during their visit.
Sale and consumption of alcohol, including adherence to legal drinking age requirements and responsible service practices.
Provision of Wheelchair for senior citizen and physically challenged person only.
Lost and Found items can be reclaimed only after documentation and verification of the guest.
Parking is available. Guests are requested to park only in authorized and dedicated parking areas of the venue.
Do not sit at tables that are already reserved.
Arms and ammunition are not allowed inside the premises.
Outside food and beverages are not allowed.

data.title: Demo 3
data.content: Our popular food options are Chinese food, South Indian, Indian, Chaat and fast food. We deliver great taste with best Service. Host your birthday party or any party with us and we will make it more special for you. Dine-in for lunch and dinner.
